newsitem.title: INDIA: India targets car, phone owners to widen tax net.
newsitem.headline: India targets car, phone owners to widen tax net.

text.p: Indian Finance Minister P. Chidambaram proposed in his budget for 1997/98 (April-March) on Friday to target foreign travellers, as well as owners of cars, telephones and certain immovable properties, to raise the number of taxpayers.

Residents of large metropolitan cities who satisfy any two of those four conditions should voluntarily file their tax returns, failing which income tax officials would initiate action to examine their incomes, he told parliament.
